description: Use active behavioral language that describes WHAT happens WHEN (e.g., 'Show action buttons when hovering over token' not 'Token hover handler')

examples.description: Use action-oriented language that describes behavior
content: Show action buttons when hovering over token
Create attacks from powers when clicking button
Calculate damage when attack hits target

examples.description: Describe WHAT happens and WHEN it happens
content: Save character sheet when user clicks save button
Update initiative order when new combatant joins

examples.description: Don't use vague or abstract descriptions
